programme.title: A Christmas Detour
programme.desc: Two travelers become linked when a snowstorm grounds their flight in Buffalo. Paige desperately needs to find a way to New York City to meet her fiance's parents, and it's up to Dylan, a fellow passenger and a guy she can't stand, to get her there.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia takes action when a depressed, gun-toting Santa Claus threatens to ruin Christmas for her and her housemates.

programme.desc: Rose's daughter and Dorothy's son visit their mothers at the same time.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose, Blanche and Dorothy take a vacation at a resort that doesn't live up to its reputation.

programme.desc: While Dorothy is laid off from teaching, she finds work at the same museum where Blanche goes to work.

programme.desc: Embarrassed about living with his mother-in-law, Van tries to pass Reba off as his maid; Brock tells Reba and Barbara Jean he wants to pursue his dream of golfing professionally.

programme.desc: Cheyenne is upset when Van decides to shave his head for the team; Barbra Jean convinces Reba to go into business with her.

programme.desc: Robin Colcord's lavish -- and well-protected -- apartment is the setting for Sam and Rebecca's latest misadventure.

programme.title: Love at the Shore
programme.desc: A mother of two who is an author finds her summer plans disrupted by the annoyingly unconventional but undeniably attractive surfer living next door to her rental.

programme.title: Sweet Carolina
programme.desc: A marketing executive reconnects with her high school boyfriend after becoming the unexpected guardian of her niece and nephew.

programme.title: The Beach House
programme.desc: Caretta thought she'd left her Southern roots and troubled family far behind until her mother lures her home. As she repairs the family beach house and renews old acquaintances, the rhythms of the island open her heart in wonderful ways.

programme.title: Love to the Rescue
programme.desc: Two single parents find themselves competing for the same dog at a school pet adoption function.

programme.title: The More Love Grows
programme.desc: Helen gets blindsided when her husband asks for a separation. With help from a friendly vet and a rambunctious stray dog, she rediscovers her strength and begins to rebuild her life.

programme.title: A New Year's Resolution
programme.desc: A morning show producer reluctantly becomes the subject of her own program's on-air experiment about her New Year's resolution to agree to every social invitation for a month.

programme.title: Love in the Clouds
programme.desc: Reporter Brooklyn travels to the Balloon Fiesta to meet hot air balloon pilot Jared, who offers romantic balloon rides but is closed off to love himself.

programme.desc: The Postables embark on a road trip to track down a rock star and the recipient of a lost letter.

programme.desc: Sophia's acerbic sister, whom she hasn't seen or talked to in 30 years, pays an unexpected visit.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Kyra repeatedly cancels plans with the family, Reba finds out that Barbra Jean is monopolizing all of her time.

programme.title: The Motherhood
programme.desc: Tasha poured everything into being a mom, but lost herself; with support from The Motherhood, Tasha learns to set boundaries, reclaim her space and rediscover her confidence, proving that she's not just a mom, she's Tasha too.

programme.title: The Motherhood
programme.desc: Rochelle is a superhero single mom, always putting her boys first, but now it's her turn; with support from Connie Britton and The Neighbor Ladies, she realizes that even the strongest moms deserve to prioritize themselves.

programme.title: Branching Out
programme.desc: To help build a family tree, single mom Amelia tracks down her daughter's biological father. It soon becomes a journey of trust, love and discovering the real meaning of family.

programme.title: Love of the Irish
programme.desc: Tired of bad luck, Fiona takes her mother on a trip to Ireland to turn things around. She soon meets a charming single father who helps her make her own luck.

programme.title: Dating the Delaneys
programme.desc: Three generations of Delaney women explore the highs and lows of modern-day dating, learning that love and romance can be found at any age -- and sometimes where they least expect it.
